DOC.brief_summary: To estimate pharmacokinetics relative bioavailability oxycodone administration 40 mg dos PF-00345439 formulation take whole fed condition chew fasted condition healthy volunteer
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics And Relative Bioavailability Study Of Oxycodone Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This study estimate pharmacokinetics relative bioavailability oxycodone follow oral administration single 40 mg dos PF-00345439 Formulations J K compare reference PF-00345439 Formulation A , take whole fed condition healthy volunteer . In addition , study estimate pharmacokinetics relative bioavailability oxycodone followingoral administration single 40 mg dos PF-00345439 Formulation J K ( beselected base Periods 1-3 ) chew fast condition compare take whole fed state healthy volunteer , assess single-dose safety tolerability oxycodone inPF-00345439 formulation healthy volunteer administer naltrexone block .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject 18 55 year age ( inclusive ) . Evidence history clinically significant disease . Positive urine drug test
